text: a cobbler who had very poor wits
a man who lives in his own house
none of his neighbours who had seen a ghost , though most had heard of such things , and many believed in them
most had heard of such things
a son with so little wit
a ghost that appeared to a man in his own house
one could really fall asleep in the face of the apparition
a blacksmith who lived near , and he had run in in his night - shirt without so much as slippers on his feet
